name: Half-Fly3
description:
Half-Fly3 is a colorful relaxing shooter without a heavy story but with some rogue-like mechanics such as:
- Random shop items and their price,items reroll.
- Random next room features and item pool.
- Random pickups and curses.

Key Features for current Early Access version

  • Procedural generation - Rooms,Decors,some items and especially Flies has random features: Skins, Colors, Faces, Sizes...
  • Physics - impulses,forces and collisions based on PhysX.
  • Visual - Full 3D. High quality shadows,lights,effects,items and Flies.
  • Retro mode - you can switch from Color to Grayscale mode with some additional "Retro effects".
